General information

Job Function: 03 - Finance
Date Published: 10-Nov-2022
Ref #: R-61409
Description & Requirements
The Analyst- IT PPM (Planning Performance Management) will support the Global IT Organization by facilitating project rituals and routines with Project Managers- IT Sponsors- IT Owners- and IT Leaders. They will be responsible for partnering with Project Managers and Representatives- as well as CAPEX PPM team to support and trouble shoot project updates in ProjectNow (ServiceNow). Additionally- the individual in this role will develop a deep understanding of the IT Project processes and Project methodologies.

Are you ready for a challenging and unique type of R&D role? This position is a technical lead on the Agile Disruption Innovation R&D team- where the individual will be challenged to immerse themselves with the consumer and develop new disruptive food-based solutions. Title: Analyst- IT - Finance Systems - Security & Audit Support
Job_Description:
General information
All posting locations: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States of America
Job Function: 15 - GBS
Date Published: 07-Nov-2022
Ref #: R-62967
Description & Requirements
The Payroll Analyst will be part of the Global Business Services organization- positioned within the Hire to Retire team in the North America Business Services function. The role will be in Pittsburgh- PA and will be responsible for delivering operational processes for the US and Canada countries within the North America Zone. The Payroll Analyst is responsible for assisting in processing payroll in a shared service environment. The Payroll Analyst coordinates work processes that requires an overall understanding and working knowledge of payroll/Human resource information systems and payroll processes. The position exercises discretion and tact in the processing of documents and information of a confidential or sensitive nature.

General information

Job Function: 04 - IT
Date Published: 10-Nov-2022
Ref #: R-63196
Description & Requirements
The Senior Financial Manager- IT Software will lead the financial planning- compliance and spend management activities related to our Global Software solutions. This role is an integral part of the Software Asset Management (SAM) team- which reports directly into IT Leadership. Our desire is to deliver process excellence- as we continuously evolve to support the strategic growth of the organization!

Title: Analyst- IT - Finance Systems - Security & Audit Support
Job_Description:
General information
All posting locations: Chicago, Illinois, United States of America, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States of America
Job Function: 04 - IT
Date Published: 11-Nov-2022
Ref #: R-58606
Description & Requirements
The Kraft Heinz Information Technology organization is hiring a o9 Solution Architect who will be responsible for the overall solution architectural design of the o9 Platform in the support of our global installation. The role will have primary focus with our North America program and expand to responsibilities globally as we deploy. The role will perform primary hands-on activities to evaluate all business requirements and define solutions within the o9 Platform. Once the solutions are defined- the role will actively lead the technical vision to success through design- configuration- and test in an agile sprint-based framework.

Title: Client Success Manager
Job_Description:
Company Description

From concept to design to execution, be part of an innovative organization that helps transform client ideas into realities.
Do you want to impact the world around you on by providing cutting edge solutions to your clients? Does having a company care about your career today and into the future motivate you? Does an environment where your opinions matter excite you? Are you a natural born tinkerer? If so, you have found your next calling!!
Grantek is a recognized leading provider of integrated automation, smart manufacturing and industrial information solutions in the global marketplace. Our clients are some of the worlds most respected Fortune 100 companies and recognized consumer brands: GlaxoSmithKline, Brita - The Clorox Company of Canada, Molson Coors Beverage Company, Coca-Cola, Kraft Heinz, Mondelez to name a few.

Title: Client Success Manager
Job_Description:
Inland Packaging is a local label and packaging manufacturer seeking an innovative and dynamic Business Systems Analyst II to join our growing team. Here at Inland, we print labels for brands like Kraft Heinz, New Glarus Brewing, Sprecher’s, Leinenkugels, and Coors Light. Inland family-owned business (77 years- to be exact) that invests in cutting edge technology and provides endless career advancement opportunities
This position would also be ideal for IT professionals who identify with the following job titles: .NET Developer, Programmer, Application Developer, Web Developer, Full-Stack Developer or Software Engineer.
To start your career with Inland with this exciting career opportunity, click the “Apply Now” for immediate consideration.

Title: Senior Financial Analyst- Data Assurance – Global Internal Reporting
Job_Description:
General information
All posting locations: Chicago, Illinois, United States of America
Job Function: 03 - Finance
Date Published: 26-Oct-2022
Ref #: R-62576
Description & Requirements
Summary:
This is a Global role where the Senior Financial Analyst is expected to support the Global BU/HQ functions in identifying and resolving variances between the internal financial reporting tool (SST) and external financial reporting tool (HFM). The senior analyst is expected to lead the variance analysis discussions- propose solutions and recommend solutions by working with local regional controllership teams- the FP&A teams and IT.
